Title: Requires the departments of health and mental hygiene to create a pamphlet of mental health resources for those who have suffered a pregnancy loss
Summary: Requires the departments of health and mental hygiene to create a pamphlet of mental health resources for those who have suffered a pregnancy loss, including, but not limited to, a miscarriage, stillbirth or abortion; requires providers to give patients an adequate supply of menstrual products upon discharge to help with their aftercare.
LawCode: Add §§2997-f-2 & 267-a, amd §2997-b, Pub Health L; add §7.50, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring the departments of health and mental hygiene to create a pamphlet of mental health resources for those who have suffered a pregnancy loss
